title: Dell security advisory (AV25-642)
description: Between September 29 and October 5, 2025, Dell published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Dell APEX Cloud Platform for Red Hat OpenShift  versions prior to 03.05.00.00
Dell PowerProtect DP Series Appliance (Integrated Data Protection Appliance)  versions 2.7.9 and prior
Dell PowerProtect Data Domain  multiple versions
Dell XtremIO X2  versions prior to 6.4.4
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
